movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sagar Sailesh
Starring by: Sagar Sailesh, Sri Rithika
Genres: Horror, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Rahasyam deals with Ravi (Sailesh), an aspiring director who plans to make a horror based film. An unexpected twist arises in the form of a ghost Divya (Rithika) who haunts Ravi to cast her as the heroine of his film.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Gagan Gopal Molka
Starring by: Kamal Kamaraju, Pooja Ramachandran, Mouryani
Genres: Horror, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Vikram(Kamal Kamaraju) is a police officer who falls in love with his sister’s friend Radha(Mouryani). As time passes by, even Radha falls for Vikram and the couple spend some happy times together. On the other hand, Radha is often followed by her building watchman named Rudra. After a point in the story, the watchman and his four close friends keep getting killed one after the other.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vignesh Shivan
Written by: Vignesh Shivan
Starring by: Suriya, Keerthi Suresh, RJ Balaji
Genres: Action, Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Uttam Das(Suriya) is a young man whose dreams of becoming a CBI officer are shattered by some corrupted officials. Upset with this, he himself forms his own gang and starts riding the businesses of big shots as a fake CBI officer. To nab Uttam, a special cop(Karthick) is appointed by the government.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Mahi V. Raghav
Starring by: Mammootty, Mahesh Achanta, Rajsekhar Aningi
Genres: Biography
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The story is all about YSR played by Mammootty and how he went on a Padayatra before the historical 2004 elections. The film showcases what problems did YSR face in his journey and how he won the elections victoriously.

movieInfo:
Directed by: PV Giri
Starring by: Naveen Vijay Krishna, Nithya Naresh, Shravya
Genres: Comedy, Horror, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Nandini Nursing Home is a story that is set completely in a hospital. Chadoo (Naveen) an Mcom graduate gets an appointment letter from a hospital to join as a junior doctor. The twist in the tale arises when a ghost continuously causes the hospital’s revenues to dwindle. Unravelling the mystery of the ghost is the rest of the story.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Bharati Babu Penupatruni
Starring by: Mahidar, Sravya Rao and Bhanu Chanderin
Genres: Drama, Horror, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Mahidar(Sriram) is an aspiring actor who falls in love with Janaki(Sravya Rao). On the other hand, Mahidar and his friends get duped by an agent called Shankar Anna(Prabha Sreenu) who takes them to the bungalow of Bhupati(Bhanu Chandar) in order to rob him. Not knowing this fact, the group enter the bungalow and start getting killed one after the other.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Mohan Ravipati
Starring by: Vaayu Thanai, Shaheen, Deviprasad
Genres: Drama
ntry: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The movie will begin with a bump in the court of Chief Minister who rules the state politics. The current chief minister can not help him, but he does not want to help a star hero when he accidentally dies, and then the younger son will not be the chief minister, and the party that he does not like is the CBI ink.

movieInfo:
Directed by: R Raghuraj
Starring by: Eswar, Tuya Chakraborthy, Anketa Maharana
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A love triangle which revolves around a rich engineering student, Ajay, a violinist Anjali, whose strict mother despises rich people, and a sexy fashion designing student Anupama. What follows is a saga of lust and love among these three individuals.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anand Shankar
Written by: Anand Shankar, Anand Shankar
Starring by: Vikram, Nayanthara, Nithya Menon
Genres: Action, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A guy named love creates a new drug which enhances human ability to fullest. He tries to sell the drug to terrorist groups and therefore leading to destruction of millionaire of lives.Now its up to an Indian raw agent named akhilan to stop him at any cost.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vema Reddy
Starring by: Sumanth Ashwin, Madhunandan, Sai Pradeep Mocherla
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Adi (Sumanth Ashwin) and Avi (Rehana) are studying at the same collage. Adi is a love guru and advises boys not to express their love for girls until they reveal their true feelings.Avi decides to make Adi fall in love with her.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Kovera
Starring by: Kovera, Himansee, Tanikella Bharani
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film revolves around a small police investigation in Rudravaram village, which leads to solving a mystery around the underworld.

movieInfo:
Directed by: V.A. Shrikumar Menon
Written by: Harikrishnan, Hari Krishnan
Starring by: Mohanlal, Prakash Raj, Manju Warrier
Genres: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Odiyan Manikyan returns to his village Thenkurissi after a self-imposed exile of 15 years, following the deaths of two people. How does his return impact those in the village and the lives of others that he has shrouded in darkness.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Mohana Krishna Indraganti
Starring by: Sudheer Babu Posani, Aditi Rao Hydari, Shishir Sharma
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A guy who hates cinema meets a superstar and falls for her. Despite being a big star, the woman’s real side is shown, sans make-up and starry airs. And our hero has complete access to her. Just when you think a romance is brewing, it all comes crashing down. But in Sammohanam, the lines between reality and fantasy are often blurred – and much like the lead pair’s romance, a promising entertainer comes crashing down.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kalyanji Gogana
Starring by: Ashish Gandhi, Ashima Narwal
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Koteswarao – an easygoing youth hailing from the village of Chintalapudi – is in love with Parvati, and the couple share a sparkling chemistry. But life has a few surprises in store for them, which eventually forces Koteswarao into a path of violence.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Boyapati Srinu
Written by: M. Rathnam, Boyapati Srinu
Starring by: Ram Charan, Kiara Advani, Vivek Oberoi
Genres: Action, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ram(Charan) is an orphan who grows up with four other brothers who are also orphans. All of them spend some lovely times together and Ram keeps saving his family from evil people. But the twist in the tale arises when one of the brothers(Prashanth) who is an election officer gets into deep problems with a dreaded gangster called Raja Bhai(Vivek Oberoi).

movieInfo:
Directed by: Paruchuri Murali
Written by: G.G.V.K. Chiranjeevi
Starring by: Jagapathi Babu, Darshana Banik, Brahmanandam
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Siddharth(Nara Rohit) is a reputed film director who gets arrested for his wife’s(Darshana) murder. During the course of the case, a high-profile public prosecutor called Veerendra(Jagapathi Babu) fights Siddharth’s case and sets him free of all charges. The twist in the tale arises when Veerendra finds out that the murder mystery has a different set up completely.
